about_the_game:
About the content included in the demo version of this Coin Push RPG Demo:

1、This demo will open up the full game chapters 1-3 (the full version will have at least 6 chapters).

2、Opening the contents of “Shop”, “Research Center”, “Stronghold” and “Workshop” in the game.

About the official version of the follow-up will launch more gameplay contains（This demo version does not contain the following）:

1、The official version will complete the content of the next 4-6 chapters.

2、The official version will open the endless mode

3、The official version of the subsequent completion of the new gameplay - challenge mode

Game Introduction：

A simple and easy-to-learn RPG idle game that combines the coin pusher gameplay, with a large number of character backgrounds, talent combinations, and equipment choices.

Combined with high-paced monster battles and the idle mechanism, there will be a sense of satisfying grinding! Players need to recruit heroes, choose their exclusive talent skills, and assemble various squads to lead them on a journey to find treasure, upgrade villages, craft legendary equipment, and improve their strength to defeat the demon king.

Innovative in-game combat: During the battle, the coins collected by the coin pusher will be distributed to the heroes, and they will receive the corresponding amount of compensation before helping you fight monsters. Give them money to make your heroes work for you, and you can also hang out and automatically play the coin pusher to grind!

Recruit various heroes：

Each hero has a unique character background, and players can freely recruit various heroes for training. By matching different equipment and talents, you can make your team stronger!

Choose various talents The game offers a variety of talents to choose from, and by selecting different talents, you can enhance different aspects of the hero's strength and create different combat effects!

Equip various gear:

During the exploration process, monsters will drop powerful equipment of various types. As the team's treasure hunting value attribute increases, the quality of the dropped equipment will also increase!

Adjust the positioning of the formation:

Players can freely assemble their lineup and adjust the positioning of the heroes to find the best positions for them, thus better utilizing their skills to achieve maximum effectiveness!
